statements: DELETE FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1001 AND gender = 'Male'
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND address LIKE '%New York%'
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM MedicalRecords WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith' AND date_created < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19');
DELETE FROM MedicalRecords USING Patients WHERE MedicalRecords.patient_id = Patients.patient_id AND Patients.gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1001 AND address = '123 Main St'
DELETE FROM medical_records WHERE record_id IN (SELECT record_id FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date < CURRENT_DATE)
DELETE FROM appointments WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id AND dob < '1990-01-01')
DELETE FROM MedicalRecords WHERE patient_id = 1 AND admission_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' AND treatment = 'Quarantine';
